item.description:
A Medical Devices Regulatory Update


On January 19, 2011, the FDA announced a long awaited plan of action for implementation of  steps to a smarter medical device program.  Come hear industry experts discuss the implementation of the plan as well as other emerging issues such as device   

P.H. Benjamin Chang, Managing Director, Consilium Partners, Wellesley, MA

 

Robert Kerwin, Esq., Tarlow, Breed, Hart & Rodgers, P.C., Boston

 

Mark Leahey, President, Medical Device Manufacturer's Association, Washington, D.C.

 

Barry Sands, President, RQMIS, West Newbury, MA

 

Casper Uldriks, Esq., Olsson Frank Weeda Terman Bode Matz, PC, Washington, D.C. 

 

David Vogel, President, Intertech Engineering Associates, Inc., Westwood, MA 

 

Mary Yebba, FDA Public Affairs Specialist, U.S. Food & Drug Admintration. Northeast Region, Stoneham, MA

 

Use Code MDG302 for special discount.

 

Date: March 2, 2010
Time: 7:30 - 10:00AM
Location: Holiday Inn, 4 Highway Drive, Tewksbury, MA
Info: Suzanne Ferrara (sferrara@mvvf.org)

http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e3djp0ib698c52f2&llr=bc4mmwn6

assurance practices, and reaction from the investment community.

 

The Panel Includes:
